body: It's basically The Naked King picture book but with /ss/
AHAHAHAHA. Mizuryu always has an awesome setting for his H. MC high, Mizuryuland, and now this. Please never change.
Mizuryu Kei's doujins: Sexy, slutty female + pure shota boy = slutty female corrupting innocent boy.

Is there a way, even for those who don't know Japanese, to translate the lyrics? (Also because Google Translate translates badly and you don't understand anything) Besides, you will be full of work and you can't satisfy everyone with translations. Thanks for the reply. :)
